4. In the popular TV show, Rick and Morty, there is an episode called "A Rickle in Time," where the main characters, Rick and Morty, become trapped in a time loop and encounter a being known as "Time God," who appears to be based on Hermes. 

5. Furthermore, many companies have used the name "Hermes" in their branding as a reference to the god of commerce, including the high-end fashion brand, Hermes. 

These are just a few examples, but there are many more modern-day references and representations of Hermes in popular culture!
